text: Kump winning the Velothon Stockholm in 2015. Marko Kump (born 9 September 1988) is a Slovenian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . ==Career== In 2011, he signed a one-year contract with for the 2012 season. Kump left at the end of 2012, and joined for the 2013 campaign. He returned to for the 2015 season. ==Major results== ;2007 : 1st Porec Trophy ;2008 : 3rd Porec Trophy ;2009 : 1st Stage 4 Tour of Slovenia : 1st Stage 3 Tour de l'Avenir : 2nd Praha–Karlovy Vary–Praha : 2nd Road race, Mediterranean Games : 4th Trofeo Zsšdi : 4th Overall Coupe des Nations Ville Saguenay ::1st Stage 1 : 5th Gran Premio della Costa Etruschi : 6th GP Kranj : 6th ZLM Tour :
